name: Kk B
text: Pizza was excellent and they had a drive through where you could call and place online and drive through to pick it up. It's located like 5 minutes from Cherokee casino so its convenient and cheap and staff was friendly.

name: Shannon Gillen
text: The personal pan pizza with tomatoes, spinach and mushrooms looked delicious.  Reality was that it was just okay.  The spinach and mushrooms were good but the tomatoes were rotten.  Underneath it all, there didn't seem to be enough sauce or â€¦More

name: Sheila Van Meter
text: My Vege pizza is AMAZING!  Cooked perfect extra crispy as requested.  The management over the top professional and friendly!  I love my pizza hut in Cherokee, NC!

name: Natalie Thomas
text: Ordered a pepperoni lovers pizza w/extra cheese. VERY disappointed. Paid too much for this! Wont ever be back! Doesn't even taste good. P.Hut has nothing on Papa John's or Marco's pizza.

name: Joy Lee
text: The employees were very nice! The food was good ol' Pizza Hut quality so we enjoyed it. The interior needs some work. The salad bar looked kind of sad and I'm not sure if they still use it as a buffet but the buffet table is now used to hold boxes. It just needs a little remodel. I'm all for buffets though!

name: Lamar Wildcat
text: The place in general is good.its there menu for the point redemption that sux.theres only cpl options to choose from.i eat the traditional wings all da time but when I want to redem my points the only option is boneless.so they need to put traditional on there point redemption menu.thats my only beef with pizza hut.

name: Dee Gabbert
text: Purchased the $19.99 special 3 topping large pizza, boneless wings and bread sticks. chicken tasted old. Very bland pizza. Seemed under cooked. May never visit pizza hut again. Shame on you pizza hutðŸ¤®ðŸ¤¢

text: Thank you so much! Pizza delivery was great <3. Food was great to!

text: Itâ€™s usually good pizza, here. But sometimes everything can seem to be over cooked & a little dry. But the wings are always up to par. Sometimes, we ONLY order the chicken wings!

text: When place order go thru drive thru when they have said how long to pick it up. They don't bring it out to you. Great tasting pizza! Poor instructions!

text: The service is monolithic when compared to Domino's.  You guys are good..real good.  Food was perfect in presentation and taste after delivery.

text: I ordered  the supreme it was Amazing an hot first time from the one in Cherokee an will definitely do it again ordering

text: Mark was very courteous on phone call. I had delivery and it was here before time they said. The delivery guy was courteous. Pizza was hot and very good. I will use Pizza hut again. Thank you.

name: Chester Karwowski
text: Very expensive wings.  At $24 for 18 wings I felt robbed.  Then it got worse when I started eating and realized I only had 16 wings.  The wings were good, but that was a huge disappointment.  Of course I was already about 10 miles down the road before I realized I was short.

text: Its pizza hut. Hard to mess up

text: Staff very friendly.  Went in and had to order take out wanted to get in pool at hotel. Pizza cooked well done just like we asked. To much pizza.

name: Robert Bass
text: Called and placed my order then after 15 minutes I showed up and NO pizza. And the female at the window had the nerve to tell me that I didn't talk to her. BS... I mean she had that nerve. You can't hide that accent.

name: Teresa Pate Ammons
text: Delish and super fast delivery

text: Dining area clean. Ordered a personal pan super supreme pizza and cheesy breadsticks and it was delicious! Buffet was available if I had wanted. Easy entrance from road and driveup window if you call or place an order online available. No delivery service on Saturday or Sunday. Will definitely visit again!

text: Had a great time with friends! The atmosphere and guest services were excellent! I would recommend this pizza hut to anyone who wants to enjoy pizza for a right price. Our waitress was very hospitable and courteous. We all had different foods from the menu and enjoyed every bit of it. Kudos to this restaurant!

name: Melissa Schneider
text: This Pizza Hut is the best ever!!! We ordered deivery to our room. The lady who took our order was very patient as I was indecisive and she even looked up the hotel address for us!!! Food arrived earlier than they had told us it would. â€¦More
